channel.title: Bailing on Hi, this is ExhYZ.
channel.description: Recent content in Bailing on Hi, this is ExhYZ.

item.title: Introducing Ethonwork Bailing
item.description: TL;DR After the progressive development of AI all over the world in March, we reached a whole new level of AI language models. We created Bailing (Lark), which is a series of models that everyone can run locally on low-end personal PCs. Including English and Chinese support. What’s this? A few months ago, Facebook (Meta) released their open-source language model LLaMA. It’s not the same powerful as OpenAI’s Chat-GPT, but open source means we can do lots of improvements based on the official model.
